model

Class OrderAccessObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.OrderAccessObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOrderDao

    public class OrderAccessObject
extends Object
implements IOrderDao
    DataAccessObject for Order class. It is used for storing order information to a database.
